# Task Template

## Meta Information

- **Task ID**: `TASK-XXX`
- **Title**: Brief descriptive title
- **Status**: `Not Started` | `In Progress` | `Blocked` | `Review` | `Complete`
- **Priority**: `P0` | `P1` | `P2`
- **Created**: [Date]
- **Updated**: [Date]
- **Estimated Effort**: [Hours/Days]
- **Actual Effort**: [Hours/Days]

## Related Documents

- **PRD**: Link to relevant Product Requirements Document
- **ADR**: Link to relevant Architectural Decision Record (if applicable)
- **Dependencies**: List of tasks this depends on

## Description

Provide a clear, concise description of what needs to be accomplished. Include context about why this task is important and how it fits into the larger project goals.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Criterion 1: Specific, testable requirement
- [ ] Criterion 2: Another specific requirement
- [ ] Criterion 3: Additional requirements as needed

## TODOs

- [ ] Create migrations

- [ ] Etc...
- [ ] TODO with notes

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
